name: Tartarus (itch) (beefgojira)
description: This is my entry for the ludum dare 47 competetion. Tried to do something around being trapped in time loops. First time I've ever posted anything, and vertainly never tried tomake anything in this time scale. All the code and graphics are mine ( except Chronos and a heavily adapted character controller that caused as many problems as it solved (I'll try and make my own next time, thought it'd save some time. that was wrong)), the sounds and fonts are mainly free open source from da font and free sounds and a friend of mine did the music ( his first time doing this kinda music, thought it went pretty well). Thank for having a look....
